values.text: What is your age?
Please enter a value of your existing credits count, choose 1 or 2.
You can apply for personal loans of up to AED 2 million with tenor up to 48 months and Interest rates as low as 3.99% per year.

To apply for a car loan, you need the following documents:
- Vehicle quotation
- UAE driving license
- Bank statements (where applicable)
- Salary certificate addressed to FAB (where applicable)
- Auto-loan application completed and signed by the customer
- Copy of a valid passport/resident visa/Emirates ID (originals must also be presented)

To apply for a Debt Consolidation loan, you need the following documents:
- Liability letter
- Salary transfer letter
- Bank statement (six months)
- Application completed and signed by the customer
- Copy of a valid passport/Emirates ID (originals must also be presented)

dialog_nodes.title: Yes I want to see which loans I can apply for

values.text:
To apply for a personal loan, you need the following documents:
- Copy of a valid passport/Emirates ID (originals must also be presented)
- Bank statements for the last three months showing salary credits (if salary  is not credited to example bank account)
- Salary transfer letter/salary certificate addressed to example bank 
- Liability letter or a clearance letter (in case of buyout loans)
- Application completed and signed by the customer

options.label: Get details about the required documents to apply for loan

values.text: Would you like to
Would you like to find the amount/type of loan that you might be able to apply for?
You can apply for car loans for new or used cars of up to AED 1.5 million or 80% of the car value with interest rates starting at 2.35% per year.
You can apply for debt consolidation loans for flexible repayment terms of up to 144 months with variable and competitive interest rates available.

dialog_nodes.title: No I don't want to calculate loans

values.text: Hi, I'm Alex! Your Loan Application companion.
